text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata no kamigami no naka, dare ga shinri ni michibiku no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā wa shinri ni michibiite kudasa reru. Sorede shinri ni michibiku kata to, jibun ga michibika renakereba michi o miidasenai mono to, dochira ga shitagau no ni ataisuru no ka. Anata gata wa dō shita no ka. Anata gata wa dō handan suru no ka
